sentences.en: Astronauts did some wiry and hookup TV cameras outside the station.
sentences.cn: 宇航员维修了空间站外面一些连接电视摄像头的电线.

sentences.en: Bearded, wiry and professorial - looking , he teaches high school physics in nearby Gorham.
sentences.cn: 他满脸胡须, 瘦长结实,一副教授模样, 在戈勒姆附近的高中教授物理.

sentences.en: Consider Anthony Bruck a wiry and fashionable Chicago socialite and artist.
sentences.cn: 想想安东尼?布鲁克,他是芝加哥的名流和艺术家,他很时髦,说话声音尖细.

sentences.en: HAIR: Medium length, straight with dense undercoat, never soft, wavy or wiry.
sentences.cn: 毛质: 中等长度, 直,底毛密, 不可以软 、 成波状或丝状.

sentences.en: He is a wiry little person.
Her wiry hair was pushed up on top of her head in an untidy bun.
sentences.cn: 她粗硬的头发向上梳起，在头顶乱糟糟地盘成了个发髻。

sentences.en: His body is wiry and athletic.
sentences.cn: 他长得清瘦而结实，体格健美。

sentences.en: In this discussion with Micah the wiry old captain tended to ignore his ineffective Son, Bromley.
sentences.cn: 在同弥迦谈这类事情时,精明的老船工有意忽略他的无能的儿子布朗利.

sentences.en: It is a hard , wiry outer coat with a soft, dense undercoat.
sentences.cn: 外层披毛为刚毛, 毛质硬,内层底毛柔软浓密.

sentences.en: My horse is small but wiry and sure-footed.
sentences.cn: 我的马虽矮小，但精瘦结实，走路稳当。

sentences.en: The coat is hard, wiry and dense with a close - fitting thick jacket.
sentences.cn: 被毛为坚硬的刚毛,浓密的、厚厚的贴在身上.

sentences.en: The functional wiry coat is the breed's distinctive feature.
sentences.cn: 功能丰富的刚毛质被毛是这个品种显著的特点.

sentences.en: The wiry old man had replied with curt finality, " Geography. "
sentences.cn: 瘦老头斩钉截铁地回答: “ 地理. ”

sentences.en: The wiry, bespectacled pair won many most identical competitions over the years.
sentences.cn: 多年来,这对瘦但结实的双胞胎兄弟参加了很多“最相像”比赛并获奖.

words.tran_cn: 接有电线的；以铁丝围起的；极其兴奋的
打电报者；用金属线缠结的工人；以铁丝网捕猎鸟兽者
[电] 接线，架线；线路；金属线缝术
以金属丝装；打电报给（wire的过去分词）
打无线电报；打无线电话
用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送

trans.tran_cn: 金属丝的，金属线制的，铁丝似的，瘦长结实的
trans.tran_en: someone who is wiry is thin but has strong muscles
